product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_header: Diese eine Pfanne begleitet mich schon seit ...
review_text: ... √ºber 30 Jahren. Sie ist aus Gusseisen und wiegt zusammen mit einem Kuchengitter, das ich schon eben so lange als Grillrost verwende, 2140 gr. Dann kommen z.B. drei H√ºhnerbeine, heute mit einem fr√∂hlichen Gewicht von knapp 1100 gr. dazu. Manchmal auch 'ne Haxe.Was bisher alle √ñfen, deren Grillroste ich mit dieser Kombination belastet habe, problemlos ertragen haben, sorgt bei dieser Maschine f√ºr den GAU. Grillrost und Schienen sind derart instabil, dass mir Hinkel und Pfanne mit lautem Get√∂se durch den Grillraum absackten.Entgegen meiner sonstigen Gewohnheit hatte ich noch keine Auflaufform (Porzellan) mit Gem√ºse darunter platziert, die w√§re sonst mit gro√üer Wahrscheinlichkeit hin√ºber. Und zum Gl√ºck war es kein fl√ºssiger Eintopf. Die Sauerei mag ich mir garnicht vorstellen.Sp√§tere Versuche haben ergeben, dass bereits geringer punktueller Druck auf den Rost zum Absturz f√ºhrt, weil die Ma√üe und die Stabilit√§t einfach nicht stimmen. Selbst wenn man den Rost mit der Kr√§ngung nach oben nutzt, ist er nicht stabil. Versuche, ihn durch Zurechtbiegen etwas zu weiten, schlugen leider fehl. So l√§sst er sich nur auf der untersten Schiene, direkt √ºber der Fettpfanne nutzen.Das gibt dann mal klare Abz√ºge in der B-Note.Ansonsten heizt das Ger√§t, ist leicht zu bedienen, wird au√üen nicht unn√∂tig hei√ü, darf also im Haus bleiben. Den mechanischen Timer k√∂nnte man im 21. Jahrhundert vielleicht durch einen digitalen ersetzen. Das aber nur am Rande.Aber das mit dem Rost ... ist ein NO GO!

product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_text: Rund um einbrauchbares Ger√§t. Er tut was er soll und das f√ºr einen passablen Preis. Ein paar kleine Kritikpunkte gibt es aber. Zum einen ist die Zeitschaltuhr ganz nett aber halt nicht digital sondern analog was das genaue einstellen der Zeit mehr zu einem Sch√§tzen macht. zum Gl√ºck gibt es ja noch einen manuellen Modus. Zum anderen sind die Backbleche etwas kleiner als die F√ºhrungsschienen Im Ofen, wodurch sich diese leicht verdrehen und verkanten und auch gern mal durchrutschen. Das ganze macht das Herausziehen schwierig. Au√üerdem sollte man nichts auf den Ofen Stellen wenn dieser in betrieb ist, da die Oberfl√§che doch recht Warm wird. Zum Schluss w√ºrde ich noch jedem Interessierten noch zu raten sich die Abmessungen genau anzuschauen da das Ger√§t doch recht gro√ü ist

product_name: BRITA Filtro acqua rubinetto ON TAP V-MF (600L) - Riduce cloro, PFAS, 99,99% di batteri, microparticelle e metalli - per acqua buona e sicura da bere
review_text: Quando ho deciso di provare il filtro Brita On Tap, non sapevo esattamente cosa aspettarmi. Lo avevo visto in giro, letto qualche recensione, ma l‚Äôesperienza diretta mi ha permesso di capire meglio quanto, in effetti, potesse davvero cambiare il mio rapporto con l‚Äôacqua del rubinetto. La prima impressione √® stata quella di una grande semplicit√†. Il filtro si monta facilmente al rubinetto, grazie a degli adattatori inclusi che garantiscono una buona compatibilit√† con diversi modelli. In pochi minuti ho avuto l‚Äôimpressione che un piccolo cambiamento, ma significativo, fosse ormai pronto a fare la differenza nella mia cucina.Il filtro √® piccolo, discreto, ma dal design elegante e compatto. Mi ha subito colpito quanto fosse facile passare da un‚Äôerogazione di acqua non filtrata a quella filtrata, grazie alla comoda manopola che consente di scegliere tra tre modalit√†: filtrata, non filtrata, o il doccino non filtrato. √à un gesto che sembra banale, ma che nella routine quotidiana diventa piacevole e comodo. La vera sorpresa, per√≤, √® stata la qualit√† dell‚Äôacqua. Nonostante la filtrazione non sia particolarmente profonda ‚Äì non si arriva a ridurre la durezza o a trattenere il calcare come nelle caraffe ‚Äì l‚Äôacqua ha comunque un sapore diverso. √à come se fosse pi√π pulita, pi√π fresca, con un leggero miglioramento che la rende decisamente pi√π gradevole da bere e usare in cucina.Non mi aspettavo miracoli, e infatti non ce ne sono stati, ma il risultato √® comunque positivo. Il filtro rimuove efficacemente alcune impurit√† come il cloro, e posso dire che l‚Äôacqua ha un gusto molto pi√π "naturale" rispetto a quella del rubinetto, che in alcune zone pu√≤ risultare un po‚Äô troppo trattata. √à come se avessi fatto un piccolo ma efficace passo verso una qualit√† maggiore, senza dover ricorrere a sistemi pi√π complessi o costosi.La parte di manutenzione del filtro √® altrettanto semplice. Ogni 400 litri, basta svitare il coperchietto, sostituire il filtro e resettare il contatore. Un‚Äôoperazione che richiede pochi minuti e non crea alcun fastidio. Tuttavia, ho notato che la durata del filtro √® inferiore rispetto al modello precedente, quindi questo aspetto potrebbe deludere chi si aspettava una performance superiore o una maggiore longevit√†. Inoltre, la filtrazione non √® totale, quindi non aspettatevi di eliminare completamente calcare e durezza dell‚Äôacqua, come avviene con altri sistemi.Un altro punto che ho apprezzato √® l‚Äôimpatto ambientale. Se, come me, siete stanchi di comprare bottiglie di plastica ogni settimana, questo filtro rappresenta un vero risparmio. √à un piccolo passo per ridurre il consumo di plastica e, di conseguenza, l‚Äôimpatto sull‚Äôambiente. Ovviamente, il filtro stesso √® in plastica, quindi va smaltito nel rifiuto indifferenziato, ma il vantaggio di non dover pi√π acquistare acqua in bottiglia √® tangibile, sia per il portafoglio che per il pianeta.In conclusione, il filtro Brita On Tap ha migliorato la qualit√† della mia acqua senza stravolgerla. Non √® un prodotto essenziale per tutti, ma se, come me, siete alla ricerca di una soluzione pratica per rendere l‚Äôacqua del rubinetto pi√π gradevole, senza dover ricorrere a costosi impianti o a continue caraffe da riempire, allora √® una scelta valida. Non far√† miracoli, ma migliorer√† la vostra esperienza quotidiana, e vi dar√† una sensazione di sicurezza riguardo alla qualit√† dell‚Äôacqua che bevete e utilizzate in cucina.

product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_header: Einkaufserfolg - Sehr gute Verpackung - hohe Qualit√§tsanmutung
review_text: Der Ofen wurde zum Ende des Mai 2020 angeliefert. So kann diese Rezension nur den ersten Eindruck geben. Das erste , was auffiel, ist die (gute) Verpackung. Ein Karton, drinnen Schaumstoff (Styropor) an allen Seiten, stabile  Pappkanten, dadrin noch ein Karton, dadrinnen der Ofen.Mit der Verpackung war es ziemlich schwer zu tragen, der Ofen ohne Verpackung konnte von mir gut bewegt werden. Aufgrund anderer Rezensionen ( Thema Rauchentwicklung) haben wir die erste Inbetriebnahme auf der Terasse (kann auch ein Balkon sein) durchgef√ºhrt. Zun√§chst mal restliche Pappst√ºcke und Plastikfolienreste gr√ºndlich entfernen.Etwa 30-45 Minuten einfach aufgeheizt bis ca. 150 Grd. Celsius- dann waren restliche √ñle z.B. auf dem eingebauten Ventilator "abgeraucht" und der Backofen konnte wieder reingeholt werden. Im Gegensatz zu unserem "Alten" Backofen (60l) der 9 Jahre alt ist, hat der INQC Ofen unten keine offen sichtbaren Heizelemente, was gut ist. So k√∂nnen √ñltropfen dort keine Beeintr√§chtigungen oder gar Sch√§den verursachen. Das Innenvolumen ist mit angegebenen 70 l beachtlich. Bevor Sie den INQC kaufen, sollten Sie die Au√üenma√üe mit dem tats√§chlich am geplanten Aufstellort vorhandenen Platz abgleichen. Sie k√∂nnen den Ofen direkt an die hintere Wand schieben, weil  Abstandhalter montiert sind. Der Ofen ist sehr leise- viel leiser als der alte Ofen. Sehr praktisch ist das Backthermometer das wir zeitgleich von einem anderen Lieferanten bei Amazon erstanden. Dadurch fiel meiner Frau auf, das unbedingt die Umluftheizung eingeschaltet muss, sonst erreichte der Ofen nicht ganz die Wunschtemperatur. Das ist kein Fehler, soll aber ein Hinweis sein, um optimale Ergebnisse zu erzielen. Die Anschlussschnur erschien uns mit einem knappen Meter etwas kurz, war aber beim "alten" Ofen nicht l√§nger. Die Bedienung ist sehr einfach. Unser erster Eindruck nach wenigen Tagen: ein voller Einkaufserfolg !

Sollte es hier beim richtigen Gebrauch doch der Fall sein, so melde ich mich dazu nochmal. Es ist √ºbrigens meine ehrliche Meinung und keine falsche Bewertung.üëç PS. Habe ihn jetzt fast ein Jahr. Bin immer noch sehr zufrieden.  Er sieht innen noch aus wie neu, dank der Emaillierte Beschichtung. Da wir auf einem Grundst√ºck wohnen und √∂fter zusammen backen, ist es sehr praktisch die vollen Bleche einfach mit in die andere Wohnung zu nehmen.  Kann ihn wirklich w√§rmstens empfehlen üëçüòç P.S. Immer noch alles ok, bin sehr zufrieden. Er sieht immer noch aus wie neu, durch den leicht zu reinigende Innenraum.

review_text: Ich habe diesen Ofen f√ºr meine Einzimmerwohnung gekauft damit ich auch hier, wie zuhause, Pizza, Aufl√§ufe und Braten machen kann.Das Ding ist Riesengro√ü und wiegt sehr viel. Das ist keine √úberraschung, es geht aus den Daten hervor. Trotzdem w√ºrde ich jemanden, der einen kleinen Backofen z.B. f√ºr die Einzimmerwohnung sucht wirklich raten, etwas kleineres zu nehmen. Klar hat das Teil jede Menge volumen aber wirklich was Anfangen kann man damit nicht. Es soll halt eine hohe auflaufform und vielleicht mal ein Braten oder ein Vogel reinpassen, und wenn m√∂glich noch ein Tropfblech. Das alles geht auch mit einem kleineren Ofen.Direkt aus dem Paket macht er generell einen guten Eindruck, einige kleinere Kratzer und Dellen, wo Schrauben scheinbar zu fest angezogen wurden. Es ist ein bisschen was umhergepurzelt und gerutsch wenn man das Paket getragen hat, kaputtgegangen ist aber zum gl√ºck nichts.Er ist sehr sperrig, weshalb ich beim Aufbauen empfehlen w√ºrde, einen Helfer einzuspannen. Ich habe ihn erstmal aufgemacht und einmal grob durchgewischt. Hierbei sind irgendwelche Sp√§ne von einer beschichtung oder so aufgefallen, ich kann aber nirgendwo abbl√§tterung sehen daher halte ich das f√ºr R√ºckst√§nde aus der Fertigung.Jetzt das Gro√üe Problem: Die Bleche und das Rost sitzen nur sehr, sehr locker in den Schienen. Sie bewegen sich viel hin und her, was vor allem dann nicht besonders vertrauenserweckend ist, wenn man relativ schwere Steingutauflaufformen benutzen will. Am allerschlimmsten ist aber, dass ich zum ausprobieren Lasagne in einer gro√üen Auflaufform gemacht habe, sie auf das Rost gestellt habe und den Ofen habe laufen lassen, dann nach einiger Zeit kam lautes Knacken aus dem Ofen und ich habe ihn ausgeschaltet um nachzusehen. Das ohnehin flimschig anmutende Rost ist an mehreren Stellen gebrochen, und das bei einer Temperatur von 180¬∞C. Die Auflaufform ist keineswegs √ºbertrieben Gro√ü oder Schwer f√ºr ihre Gr√∂√üe, und in einem Ofen von dieser Gr√∂√üe w√ºrde man zumindest erwarten, dass das mitgelieferte Zubeh√∂r eine ganz normale Auflaufform tragen kann.Desweiteren ist anzumerken das bei erstigen einschalten die Heizelemente erstmal zehn minuten lang stark gequalmt haben. Sollte man ihn also kaufen sollte man ihn warscheinlich erst mal eine Halbe stunde lang eingeschaltet ausl√ºften lassen.Die innenbeleuchtung ist gut und er scheint als backofen zu funktionieren - alles dauert ein bisschen lange, weshalb ich die Hitzeangabe leicht anzweifle, das ist aber nur so ein Gef√ºhl. Statt einem Rost muss man leider eines der Bleche nehmen, wenn man vermeiden will, dass gl√ºhend heisse Lasagne die Frontscheibe durchschl√§gt und alles in ihrem Weg dem Erdboden gleichmacht.Die Lasagne ist gut geworden und ich lebe noch, aber vertrauen tu ich dem Ding absolut nicht. Ich hoffe mal die Technik ist von h√∂herer Qualit√§t als das Rost, ansonsten mache ich mir sorgen um die Langlebigkeit, vor allem aber die Sicherheit des Ofens.Edit: Nachdem er in den letzten Wochen ein paar mal benutzt wurde macht der Ofen an sich einen guten Eindruck. Das Zubeh√∂r ist leider nur noch schlimmer geworden. Nach dem kaputten rost verformt sich jetzt auch das blech im Ofen stark, wodurch es sich gerne verkantet und nur mit gewalt rauszuziehen ist. Gerade ist die Oberfl√§che des Bleches somit nat√ºrlich auch nicht mehr... Anscheinend ist das hier ein ganz guter Ofen, aber das Zubeh√∂r ist leider echt das letzte. Schade, da man doch ziemlich darauf angewiesen ist, wenn man mit diesem Ofen etwas machen will. Back mal was ohne Rost oder Blech!

product_name: BRITA Filtro acqua rubinetto ON TAP V-MF (600L) - Riduce cloro, PFAS, 99,99% di batteri, microparticelle e metalli - per acqua buona e sicura da bere
review_header: Filtraggio Efficiente e Pratico per Acqua Pi√π Pura
review_text: Ho acquistato il filtro BRITA ON TAP V-MF per migliorare la qualit√† dell'acqua del mio rubinetto e sono rimasto davvero soddisfatto. L'installazione √® stata rapida e semplice, grazie al design compatto che si adatta facilmente alla maggior parte dei rubinetti.La qualit√† dell'acqua √® notevolmente migliorata. Il filtro riduce efficacemente il cloro, i PFAS, e altre impurit√†, migliorando il sapore e l'odore dell'acqua. Inoltre, offre una protezione contro batteri e microparticelle, il che mi fa sentire molto pi√π sicuro nel bere e cucinare con quest‚Äôacqua.La durata di 600 litri √® una buona garanzia, e il fatto che il filtro abbia una capacit√† di filtrazione cos√¨ alta lo rende conveniente nel lungo termine. Il flusso d‚Äôacqua √® regolare e non si riduce, anche dopo un utilizzo prolungato.In conclusione, il BRITA ON TAP V-MF √® una soluzione pratica ed efficiente per chi desidera acqua filtrata di alta qualit√† direttamente dal rubinetto. Consigliato a chi cerca un prodotto che migliora la qualit√† dell‚Äôacqua in modo semplice e sicuro.

product_name: BRITA Filtro acqua rubinetto ON TAP V-MF (600L) - Riduce cloro, PFAS, 99,99% di batteri, microparticelle e metalli - per acqua buona e sicura da bere
review_header: Un filtro Brita on Tap! Il Filtro originale.
review_text: INTRODUZIONEDi cosa stiamo parlando? Se non lo sapete gi√†, ve lo dico. Sorge per√≤ la domanda: perch√® state cercando questo filtro?PRIMO CONTATTOIl filtro Brita on Tap di cui raccontiamo √® la versione evoluta di quello che, anni addietro, avevo gi√† comperato per il sistema alla sua prima versione. Questa versione evoluta ha dei vantaggi e degli svantaggi... ma li affrontiamo a breve.Il filtro Brita on Tap √® un filtro (simile, ma non uguale a quello delle caraffe del brand tedesco) che si monta al rubinetto. Esso filtra, direttamente, l'acqua che erogate. Tranquilli, filtra solo quando desiderate voi.COME FUNZIONA?Il filtro, una volta avvitato - con o senza filettature aggiuntive, questo dipende dal vostro rubinetto, ma glia adattatori sono in confezione - consente di gestire il flusso d'acqua su tre modalit√†: filtrata, non filtrata, doccino non filtrato.Fatto. Siete pronti.FILTRAZIONELa filtrazione, che in realt√† √® quello che ci interessa davvero, √® una filtrazione marginale. Il filtro ai carboni attivi che trovate nelle caraffe, ad esempio, tratta anche la durezza dell'acqua, trattenendo parte del calcare. Questo, invece, no! Questo filtra solo da particelle nocive e fastidiose. Il che √® comunque un bene, soprattutto se la bevete l'acqua del rubinetto.IL FILTROIl filtro √® piccino, facilissimo da montare. Basta svitare dall'on Tap il coperchietto dedicato, estrarre il filtro vecchio, inserire il nuovo. Resettare il contatore (400 litri) e divertirvi con la vostra acqua preferita!IN USOIn uso, dopo quanto detto, c'√® poco da raccontare. Comodo, indubbiamente, e rapido. Non √® un cambiamento radicale, rispetto a quanto erogato normalmente dal rubinetto, ma l'acqua anche se non filtrata in modo completo, risulta un po' pi√π gradevole: parzialmente si percepisce.PRO & CONTROPer chi non ha mai avuto il modello precedente di Brita on Tap, diciamo che questo paragrafetto risulta insignificante. Per gli altri, invece, potrebbe essere punto di concordia o di discordia.Pro:- Design pi√π piacevole- Filtro pi√π compatto- Maggior facilit√† nel cambio della caricaContro:- Minore durate della filtrazione (dimezzata rispetto al veccio)- Non √® una filtrazione completa (come le caraffe)CONCLUSIONICi siamo, stiamo per terminare questo racconto.Il prodotto √® valido, talvolta diventa irrilevante averlo o no (dipende dal vostro acquedotto), ma da una sicurezza in pi√π sulla qualit√† dell'acqua che beviamo ed adoperiamo in cucina. Non √® eccessivamente costoso, ma "inquina": il filtro √® in plastica, ma non al 100%. Quindi va smaltito nel residuo.Comodo, come gi√† detto, √® un buon prodotto per chi, come me, vuole un'acqua un po' pi√π filtrata. Non fa miracoli, ma psicologicamente si (in Italia, dai, quasi ovunque l'acqua √® di ottima qualit√†).NOTA A MARGINEQuesto prodotto aiuta a risparmiare, sia economicamente che in impatto sull'ambiente. Bevendo acqua del rubinetto non √® pi√π necessario acquistare le bottiglie in plastica: tantissima plastica in meno introdotta in ambiente con il pattume, riduzione delle quantit√† prodotte. Infine anche lato economia: 400 litri di acqua in bottiglia costano!

product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_text: Ich bin echt √ºber die Qualit√§t des Minibackofens beeindruckt. Im Ganzen sieht der Backofen sehr wertig aus und er f√ºhlt sich auch so an. Die W√§rmeleistung ist hervorragend und es lassen sich darin sehr gut B√∂tchen, Brezeln und Pizzen aufbacken, aber auch Kartoffeln und Auflaufe lassen sich darin backen bzw. alles das, was man mit einem normalen Backofen auch machen kann.Die Gr√∂√üe des Backblechs beschreibe ich so: Es passt handels√ºbliches Backpapier auf das Backblech und deckt dieses komplett ab.Auch gut finde ich, dass man den Backofen ohne eine Backdauer einzustellen, ihn an und ausschalten kann. Das geht mit dem Timerdrehregler und man muss zum Einschalten den Regler nach links auf das Symbol mit der Hand drehen. Zum Ausschalten wieder auf die Null.Das Einzige woran ich etwas auszusetzen h√§tte w√§re, dass sich die Beschichtung an der Innenseite, da wo das Backblech Kontakt mit der Innenwand hat und gehalten wird, etwas abreibt. Es entsteht ein leichter wei√üer Staub, den man aber problemlos wegwischen kann.Vor Inbetriebnahme w√ºrde ich empfehlen, den Ofen von au√üen auf Sch√§den zu √ºberpr√ºfen. Dann in der Erstinbetriebnahme w√ºrde ich den Backofen auf der Maximalstufe f√ºr eine Stunde samt Backblech und Gitter aufheizen, damit die Ger√ºche die dabei entstehen, entweichen. Das sollte man eins bis zweimal wiederholen. Danach werden die Ger√ºche deutlich weniger bzw. verschwinden komplett.

product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_text: Although I haven‚Äôt had a chance yet to test the oven for the real cooking - I just unboxed it and turned on to check if it works - but I can share the first impressions already. Let me start with the good ones. The oven looks very nice (I‚Äôve got the one in a rose gold colour) and formidable. The chamber is big enough and is not inferior in size to the built-in ovens. Now to the shortcomings. The oven's door has a very rigid spring - I have to hold the oven's body so it does not slide towards me when opening the door; in addition to that it makes the door slam sharply if is not hold when closing. Another imperfection is a loud noise produced by the motor inside the oven when the rotisserie is turned on: it sounds like something is crackling and grinding inside, although the rotisserie seems to be rolling ok; fortunately, turning the rotisserie button off solves the problem for me (I don‚Äôt use it much). The temperature control knob does not have fixed positions - its movement is too smooth to me - makes me think that a temperature can be set just approximately - e.g., 40C and 60C positions are so close to each other so one can easily set 60C by mistake instead of 40C (which might be critical for some types of cooking), while 80C position is quite far from these two; I‚Äôd prefer that the knob would have a ratchet so that setting a temperature was more tangible. The biggest disappointment is the grid: visually, it is wide enough to sit on the guides inside the chamber steady,  although when inserted, the grid does not hold up on the guides - it slides down and falls through even under the slightest payload which makes the grid useless. On the other hand, the tray holds up on the guides nicely. I‚Äôll try to bend the sides of the grid somehow outward - may be it will make the grid to hold on the guides without falling down; but ‚Ä¶ what a frustration. I'm granting 4 stars for now in advance hoping that the real cooking experience with the oven won't be disappointing (will update the review later).Update 1: I managed to fix the grid by wrapping a strip cut out of the backing silicon mat around one of the edges of the grid (like illustrated on the photo) which allowed the grid to sit more tight and not fall down. I also fixed the tray in a similar way because there was a gap between the edge of the tray and the guides inside the chamber. May be the solution does not look nice but it kind of works; of course I'd prefer that the grid would sit tight out of the box.Update 2: I tried the oven for cooking a whole chicken on the rotisserie and backing the bread. The oven did good in both cases. Funny thing - the motor of the rotisserie worked much quieter when the chicken was on the rotisserie. The chicken was cooked through nicely and evenly. The loaf of Irish soda bread turned out to be perfect as well. The oven heats to 200C in approximately 10 minutes, which is not lightning-fast but quite acceptable. The feature I like is the possibility to set up a timer to ‚Äòinfinite‚Äô mode ‚Äî for me it‚Äôs much more convenient to control the cooking time using a timer on my mobile device. What I certainly dislike about the oven is the guides inside the chamber. My first thought was the problem is the grid, but the real problem was in the guides. Instead of making removable vertical railings with horizontal guides - the way it is typically done in the built-in ovens - they made guides as a part of the chamber‚Äôs walls (can be seen in the photo). As a result, neither the tray not the grid do not hold up and slide down (I‚Äôm guessing because of the slight imperfection in the parallelism of the walls); my fix with a silicon warp on the sides of the grid and the tray works. Overall, I‚Äôm happy to report that I‚Äôm satisfied with my choice ‚Äî the oven honestly earned my 4 stars.

product_name: ICQN Rustik Minibackofen 60 Liter XXL mit Umluft, Drehspie√ü, Emailliert, Anthrazit
review_header: Ein sehr guter Minibackofen von Pseudokonstrukteuren vermurkst und versaut!
review_text: Ger√§t: CQN 60 Liter XXL Minibackofen, 1800 W, Umluft, Pizza-Ofen, Doppelverglasung, Drehspie√ü, Timer, Elektrischer Mini Ofen, 40¬∞-230¬∞C, Emailliert, Ros√© [Energieklasse A]Sehr geehrte Interessenten (ganz besonders der Hersteller),bin Baujahr 1947 und glaube als ehemals weltweit t√§tiger E-Techniker hier ein ganz pers√∂nliches Meinungsbild abzugeben:Grunds√§tzlich sind Miniback√∂fen ein sehr, sehr wertvoller Helfer in der K√ºche und daher auch besonders gefragte Artikel. Die meisten(?) Hersteller und Konstrukteure dieser √ñfen glauben tats√§chlich augenscheinlich ein sehr Alltag taugliches Ger√§t den Kunden an die Hand zu geben, zumindest glauben das sehr viele von einer gigantischen Unf√§higkeit geplagter M√∂chtegern-Techniker, ist aber von einer realen und hilfreichen, Alttagstauglichen K√ºchentechnik so weit entfernt wie der Brasilianische Urwald vom franz√∂sischen Eifelturm!!!Zum Ger√§t:Ist insgesamt als gut zu bezeichnen, ist aber f√ºr die eklatanten M√§ngel und technischen Fehler viel, viel zu teurer und ein Kauf sehr gr√ºndlich zu √ºberlegen!!!Die W√§rmeisolation ist durchaus gut, aber noch sehr, sehr verbesserungsw√ºrdig!Der Drehspie√ü hat zwar einen eigenen Schalter, aber keine Kontrollleuchte, sodass wohl des √ñfteren der Drehspie√ümotor unn√ºtz l√§uft, unn√∂tigen Strom verbraucht und auch noch unn√∂tigen L√§rm erzeugt. Eine LED-Kontrollleuchte f√ºr ein par Cent w√§ren hier doch sehr angebracht!Die Temperatur und Heiztechnik ist aus meiner Sicht als Techniker eine absolute Sauerei und Fehlkonstruktion und erzeugt dadurch massive technische Falschaussagen in Bezug auf die Temperaturregelung!!!Warum ist das aus meiner Sicht so? Im Ofen sind f√ºr die Oberhitze ein Heizelement mit angeblich 800 Watt installiert (Oberhitze oder Grillen). Etwa 2 bis 4 Zentimeter neben dieser gigantischen Heiz- also W√§rmequelle sitzt erkennbar der Temperaturf√ºhler f√ºr den gesamten Garraum!!!Wenn der Nutzer beispielsweise 160 Grad Celsius am Temperaturregler einstellt glaubt er nat√ºrlich zu Recht im gesamten Ofen und am Gargut seien dann 160 Grad vorhanden. Aber dank der augenscheinlich hirnlosen Geisteslage der Konstrukteure sind die 160 Grad nur an der Ofendecke beim Heizelement vorhanden!Am Gargut sind es dann aber nur etwa 60 bis 90 Grad. Warum ist das so? Sobald der Ofendecken-Temperaturf√ºhler am Heizelement die eingestellten 160 Grad erreicht hat schaltet er die Heizung ab und das Gargut erh√§lt nun keine neue Heizw√§rme mehr und geht in den Frostschutz √ºber (!?!)Dank dieses Schwachsinns werden auch die vom Hersteller versprochenen235 bis 245 Grad am Gargut niemals erreicht!!! Maximal etwa 200 bis 208 Grad, also eine Falschaussage des Herstellers?Ohne Gargut kann es sein, dass man an diese 230 Grad mal herankommt, sobald aber Gargut oder Beh√§lter in den Back Raum eingebracht werden ist Schluss mit Lustig!!!Ein Beispiel: Das W√§rmen eines Fertigessenprodukt aus dem K√ºhlschrank soll auf 70 Grad aufgeheizt werden. Nach ein par Minuten schaltet die Heizung ab, weil an der Ofenecke 70 Grad erreicht wurden, aber das Gargut (Essen und Teller) haben aber nur eine Temperatur von etwa 30 bis 45 Grad. Was also soll das den f√ºr eine Technik sein???Beispielsweise ein Fertiggericht welches vom Hersteller mit 160 Grad und 10 Minuten Backofenheizung angegeben wurde, kann man nur erreichen indem man die maximale Temperatur am Ofen, also 235 Grad einstellt und das Fertiggericht mit einem ins Gargut eingebrachten externen Temperaturf√ºhler und Tempmessger√§t √ºberwacht. Leider sind fast alle Miniback√∂fen von anderen Anbietern auch mit dieser schwachsinnigen Technik ausgestattet.Fazit: Wegen der relativ guten W√§rmeisolierung ist dieser Ofen trotzdem noch einer der Besten, denn mit anderen √ñfen fetzt die Temperatur wie ein Porsche Targa aus den √ñfen!!! Wer den Ofen trotzdem kaufen m√∂chte empfehle ich das oben beschriebene System mit einem externen, Alarm √ºberwachten Temperaturmessger√§t zu nutzen, dann kann man auch getrost Brot und Kuchen backen.Au√üerdem ist dieser Mini Ofen trotz seiner Gr√∂√üe was den Zeit- und die Stromverbrauchswerte angeht einem Standardbackofen durchaus √ºberlegen, ganz besonders beim Tosten und √§hnlichem Gargut. Als Zusatz f√ºr einen Standardbackofen durchaus f√ºr einige nicht gegenderte K√∂che und K√∂chinnen durchaus √úberdenkens wert!!!Erkenntnis zu dieser Heiz- bzw. Kochtechnik: Der Schwachsinn ist unaufhaltsam auf dem Vormarsch, da kann man doch nur noch Knochen kotzen!!!

product_name: TAME Anti Frizz Smoothing Hair Styling Oil | Sulfate Free Leave In Hair Serum to Control Frizz, Add Shine for Curly, Frizzy, Dry Hair for Adults + Kids | Natural Hair Product Made in USA
review_header: Better than Hair Serums, It Nourishes, Protects, and Revitalizes, Provides Lustrous, Silky and Manageable Results
review_text: Clearly Tame is a great find for me, because it provides the same great results as my usual ‚Äòname brand‚Äô leave-in, no frizz, and conditioning hair product and it is much less expensive.For reference my hair is very thick, naturally dry, coarse-textured, and frizzy. When I lived on the humid seacoast, I fought and beat my hair down with a brush several times a day. Due to the humidity, my hair had lots of unwanted volume and an absurd amount of height. Any short hairstyles were impossible without looking like a curly-haired poodle and therefore, I resorted to longer hair, held back in different ponytail hairstyles.When I moved to the dry southwestern desert area, I thought that it would be easier to care for my hair, but it did not make any difference, and my hair remained frizzy. Although I use moisturizers, conditioners and an assortment of different oils, my hair dries out quickly in this weather and instead of the humid curly-haired poodle look, I am dealing with frizzy dried out straw.I use Clearly Tame after shampooing, conditioning, and after I‚Äôve blotted off the excess water, but while my hair is still wet. This hair oil is extremely concentrated therefore just a small amount is necessary, too much will result in a heavy excess and it takes longer to dry. Depending on the thickness and length of hair, pump 1-3 amounts of the oil into your hands and rub them together. Then start a few inches down from the hair roots on the scalp and apply it down the full length of hair. I have thick hair that is about 2 inches past my shoulder, and I use just one pump amount and apply the oil from mid-way down the hair shaft to the bottom hair ends. Then I pump once more, to finger comb from underneath and finish off with rubbing the rest of the leftover oil on the bottom ends. Last of all, when there seems as if there is no more oil on my palms, I smooth my hair down from the crown of my head, and although the oil is not visible on my hands any remaining oil takes care of the shorter hair layers from the top. This eliminates those ‚Äòfly-aways‚Äô from both layered pieces and any new hair growth.This oil absorbs into the hair shaft, helps to detangle minor snarls, and the wide-toothed comb glides through my hair smoothly. Then I proceed to blow dry my hair (or sometimes let it air dry on its own), and my hair results are soft, supple, manageable, and it has a silky feeling finish. Additionally, although I have coarse textured hair, it retains a clean and healthy light reflecting shine; therefore, Clearly Tame provides my hair with a professional salon finish.Since I do not wash my hair every day, I also use this on dry hair; however I use a smaller amount. One pump application provides UV protection, eliminates dryness and frizz, and delivers a healthy clean luxurious luster.Clearly Tame is NOT a hair serum; instead this is a blend of different oils, which is much healthier than serums are for our hair.  There is a big difference, hair serums sit on the outside of the hair and only coat the hair strands with silicone based ingredients, which offers smooth results. However, hair oils such as Clearly Tame, sinks into hair strands with nourishing ingredients that provides me with healthier looking hair.Additionally, hair oils are a lubricant and sealant, so they work at detangling wet hair, sealing the hair cuticles, and protecting strands from heat styling. The biggest advantage regarding hair oils are all the fatty acids, which replace the lipids (cells responsible for structure and function) in the hair strands.The key ingredient oils included in Clearly Tame are; Almond, Grape Seed, Castor Oil with Peppermint, Lavender, Rosemary, Sandalwood, Geranium, and Tea Tree Oils. These natural plant-based oils have nutrients, anti-oxidants, and anti-bacterial properties, which provide some necessary nutrients and protection from the drying and damaging UV sun-rays.Clearly Tame oil works wonders for my color and chemical treated hair, and it provides protection from the heat of my hair blow dryer, and my curling iron. Additionally, it protects and repairs the constant environment damaging exposures such as our desert hot sun, along with the constant dry winds. In conclusion, Clearly Tame hair oil eliminates the ugly and dry frizz from my color-processed hair, and delivers an amazing healthy shine and luster.

product_name: Squat Wedge Block Pair, Squat Ramp, Calf Raise Block, Anti-Slip Slant Board for Squats, ATG Equipment to Boost Workout, 17¬∞ Incline, 3.5x5.9x12.2, Backpack Included
review_header: Are you wondering if these will work with a resistance band footplate?
review_text: I have two resistance band plates that I use with my X3 Bar system, the plate that came with the X3 Bar and bands, and then I also bought a Harambe footplate as well, so I could not only have a larger, less-crowded area for my feet, but also a 2nd footplate I could use at work (I also bought extra bands to keep at work, and then I just have to haul the actual X3 bar only back & forth to work instead of everything). I use the Harambe footplate at home and the X3 footplate at work. Anyway....These Flexelent Squat Wedges fit perfectly on the Harambe plate, the front and back edges line up with the front and back of it exactly and the little "grip dots" on the bottom of the Wedges sit on the footplate fine and firm. I only use these wedges for one of the moves (Front Squat). I am very secure when I do them on the Harambe footplate; however, when I put these on the X3 Bar footplate, which is smaller, they are too big/long, which I don't think would still actually be a problem, if not for the fact that the four "grip dots" on them are too far forward and backward to sit on the actual footplate (one is like halfway on the very edge while the other one would be totally off the other edge). This actually was not a problem after stepping onto the wedges and doing the exercise, but when I finished and set the bar down, the wedges slipped forward a bit. It's not that big of a deal if it's only after you perform the move, but it's still something to know about. If those grip dots were an inch close to each other on each wedge, it would be fine or if the entire bottom of the wedges were a grip material instead of having the grip dots. One photo shows how the grip dots just aren't quite close enough to each other in order to sit on the X3 footplate evenly. The grip dots may be hard to see because everything is the same color and I didn't have the best lighting available when taking the photos.As for other things to mention, these wedges do not have an odor or stink of vulcanized rubber, chemical, plastic or some other bad material smell; they'll just smell like your shoes or your socks or feet (so pay attention to hygene.)  There is plenty of room for my bare feet on these, and there is still enough room if I'm wearing either my barefoot shoes or regular shoes (see other photos). The little embossed triangles on the wedges for gripping onto your feet or socks or shoes do not hurt my feet at all and so far are not uncomfortable in any way, and they keep me in place with no slippage.I have just ordered a smaller set of wedges to use with my X3 Bar footplate since these Flexelent wedges are too big for them. That's fine for me anyway, since I need a pair at home and a pair for work also. Now I'll just need to get an extra bar so I don't have to haul anything back and forth :)For reference:  I wear size 10W shoes.  X3 Bar footplate is 19 inches long x 9 inches wide  Harambe footplate is 23.5 inches long x 11.75 inches wide

product_name: Curio Display Cabinet with Light, Storage Shelves with Pop-up Glass Doors, 2 Drawers & 3 Color Light, Collectibles Cabinet Display Shelf, Bookshelf Showcase for Living Room, Black w/Drawer
review_text: First, a caveat, I did not use the lighting system that comes with the cabinets as I am installing custom lighting throughout the room.  Just from playing with the LED strip I do think you would likely see all the little dots very plainly rather than a solid strip of color as it looks in the pictures. But it seems like a standard light strip and easy-ish to install since all the wiring is already setup for you.  Probably worth checking out LED light trays with diffusers to add on yourself though, I will be.Overall I‚Äôd say the quality is fine.  I bought two of these, 31.5‚Äù across with drawers and the 47.2‚Äù across.  I‚Äôve certainly had worse particle board furniture.  Most the holes lined up ok other than some of the door screws. And the holes between the walls for the lighting of the large cabinet getting almost completely covered up by the shelf which should be above the hole. There were some minor manufacturing defects, slightly warped boards, the glue for one of the doors seeped out badly in one spot. I cut off the bits that were on top with a razor but there is clearly more inside the glass right in the center of the front which I will just live with.There was also a bit of an issue with shipping, the packages which arrived first were very banged up and there was damage where something pierced all the way through the padding and tore the black cardboard backing of the thinner cabinet which again I can just repair/hide myself since it‚Äôs in the back and I put the most damaged pieces up high and down low out of main view.  I was also delayed because one package appeared to have been completely lost or destroyed in shipping as a new one was sent automatically just a week behind.  But they were packaged quite well in my opinion so I can‚Äôt blame the maker for the shipper‚Äôs issues.The doors are very adjustable in all three dimensions which helps cover and make up for some of the warp.  Though there will always be a bit of a gap between them.  On the plus side the doors are push to open and they have spring hinges to prevent slamming shut and which gently auto close when nearly shut.The drawers are obviously not very deep.  The large drawers on the bottom of the 31.5‚Äù across cabinet glide fairly smoothly and the beveled edge makes it easy to open even with no knobs.The drawers on the larger 47.2‚Äù cabinet are not nearly as smooth, rather they are very shaky with poor rail fit and with all smooth edges hard to open and easy to slam.Be advised though that you must have 2 people to completely assemble any of these cabinets. You might also consider purchasing black dot stickers to cover the .5‚Äù assembly holes in the particle board as they stand out. Finally it is big and heavy, not super wonky; but, as all particle board furniture, also not super stable so I will definitely be using wall anchors, some basic ones are included I will likely buy better quality ones separately.The thinner cabinets are about right for the price. The larger cabinet is a bit overpriced for the quality in my opinion. But it is fine and it goes with my new home office.

review_header: Great inverter, accessories don't work, support is subpar. EDITED
review_text: Purchased this unit just over a month ago. When I received, the remote cable would not connect to the port (it would slide it, but it would not click in, meaning it would just fall back out again). Evidence of poor design and quality control. Furthermore, I purchased the BT-2 module, which connects to my other renogy products, but will not connect to this inverter. Having to send back and buy a replacement. Very disappointed.EDIT: I returned the defective unit and Amazon replaced it free of charge. The new unit arrived and the BT-2 module connection was instantly successful this time. It's a real shame that the defective unit will probably end up in a landfill, and I was really hoping it was just a firmware issue, but it was important enough for me for all of the unit's features to work properly out of the box. I still wish my support experience had been better and that we would have been able to solve the initial issue without having to replace the unit, but I am thankful the the replacement was efficient and that the new one now seems to work.

review_text: This definitely exceeded our expectations for being particle board though it‚Äôs still a little expensive for what it is. I wasn‚Äôt sure what to expect based on other reviews. review_header: A display cabinet that isn't great for display
review_text: We bought one of these to check out the product and had intended to by 3 more if we liked the shelf. It was relatively easy to assemble and the instructions were pretty clear.  The shelf itself is ok, the issue is with the glass doors. I'm not sure if the box sat in a warehouse for a long time or it was exposed to a high level of humidity, but there is a cloudy film on the glass that cannot be removed regardless of how long you scrub to remove it.  The ironic part about the weird scummy film on the glass is that if you look at under normal lights, you can't really see it, however if you look at it with LED lights, the glass looks like a dirty aquarium.  Unfortunately the lights inside the shelf are LED, so that makes it problematic to "display" things inside. That is a considerable flaw, considering the cost was $329.  The other problem I have with this shelf considering the amount it costs is that the lighting does not come with a power brick and it requires an old school USB-A power brick which I don't really have laying around in 2024.  The parts are under warranty, so we'll be contacting the manufacturer tomorrow. I'm going to request that they replace the glass doors, so we'll see how they respond.

product_name: Pure Country Weavers Personalized Woven Photo Blanket - Not Printed - Custom Gift Picture Tapestry Throw 100% Cotton - Made in The USA (72x54)
review_header: Incredible! Do not hesitate! Great company!
review_text: I love this company! I have been ordering many throws as Christmas presents and have been really impressed by their beauty--then decided to try using my own photograph, and honestly, it came out better than I could have imagined. I looked at the one-star reviews of people who were unhappy by the sharpness of their throw, so I would absolutely advise you to send only high quality, sharp images if possible and if you are picky. If you send a blurry photo, it's going to be extremely soft. My image was well-focused but nowhere near the largest file size accepted, and the image is honestly incredible! Do not hesitate to order, but remember it may not to look exactly like the photo as far as contrast, density and color--completely different medium, and colors are very difficult to match anyway. Having said that, mine was remarkably in line with the image I sent. Absolutely marvelous winter gifts!

product_name: Philips Norelco Multigroomer All-in-One Trimmer Series 3000, 13 Piece Mens Grooming Kit, for Beard, Face, Nose, and Ear Hair Trimmer and Hair Clipper, NO Blade Oil Needed, MG3750/60
review_header: Fantastic bit of basic kit for the facial-haired out there
review_text: The price -- gotta mention this value is thru the roof... w/ caveat, detailed later.I do like Philips products -- my Sonicare has been going strong for years now, granted very careful treatment and regular maintenance. Good engineering, and not planned obsolescence behind plausible deniability, will always find my wallet out to reward. Mostly, Philips has delivered for products I've purchased from them -- not always the least expensive... but when has that ever meant the best quality, given the hoards of PRC-made crap that lasts a fortnight at pennies on the dollar? Much rather pay one and done for something I can depend on, vs. several times at cutrate price.Don't get me wrong -- Philips is not a model mfr, far from it. But their personal care stuff usually asks for a bit more cash for a lot more product.So then this came across my gaze -- is that the actual price? Luckily my facial hair has grown to teh point of genuine need for tools... so at that price, just had to see what Philips had to offer.Hands down... this is a great little set of basic clipper tools for your male gob. Nose hair trimmer was a boon -- will defo make use of that, as well as guards for the normal wide clipper + a narrow-gauge one. All I need, really. And there are more well-equipped sets to get should you want more for not much more cash.Only possible gripe out the box, is reversal of orange-means-on, no-orange-means-off on this unit's power switch. Rather if you turn it on (granted the | and O power icons are on the switch) the orange paint disappears. The switch is also a *touch* difficult to slide, | \ O. I do realise I'm reaching very far into the weeds here -- and tbh, it all  took 3s to get used to, and doesn't affect the function of the clippers in use.So sold on this Multi Groomer 3000 13-pc so far -- will update if any quality issues crop up, once daily-using. Five stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

product_name: Clearly GLOW Teeth Whitening Activated Charcoal Powder + Ultra Soft Bamboo Toothbrush | Pure, Natural, Food Grade, Non GMO, Made in USA | Whiten Teeth Naturally (20g)
review_header: Not recommended. Good quality ingredients, messy to use, mediocre results.
review_text: The good:-Good quality ingredients. The charcoal does appear to be very pure and the powder is very fine.-Economical. A little charcoal goes a long way.Things to be aware of:-The product will cause some temporary dark discolouration of your gums. This is likely a tiny bit of residual charcoal, but worth mentioning as it can be unsightly.-The product will stain your toothbrush head and bristles black. Use a second toothbrush if this matters to you.-Keep your mouth fully closed when brushing with the product. If you brush with your mouth open, the toothbrush may fling droplets of black liquid which could stain surfaces or fabrics. Also use care when spitting out the product and rinsing for the same reasons.The bad:-The product can be very messy. A lot of care has to be used at every step when using this product.-Mediocre results. Although a fun to use and not having had any ill effects, I did not find the results of this product to be extraordinary. Nothing life-changing here.Would I recommend this or buy this again? No, I did not experience any significant whitening effects.

    I am a NY-based personal trainer and online coach who specializes in strength training. When I first chatted with this brand on IG, I was looking for a new accessory to help me improve my range of motion when it came to my squats and limited ankle mobility. As someone who had foot surgery a couple years ago, I still have not quite been able to regain optimal flexion in my big toe and my ankles often feel stiff. The first day I brought these wedges to the gym, I used them in my warm up to stretch my tight calves and hammies and then took them for a spin in my barbell squats and split lunges. THE DIFFERENCE! Literally drastic!I could feel my glutes being utilized so much more by adding the elevation to my squats which helped increase my range of motion overall. I love that the products comes with a drawstring bag that can easily be brought to the gym and I LOVE that these are wedges vs. a slant board, which makes them compact enough to be carried to the gym and stored in a locker if needed.I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE WEDGES! They have made me more excited about unlocking new levels of strength as I feel like I have so much more range of motion now!

review_header: This vanity checks all the boxes!
review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    Had 5 months & still GREAT! BEAUTIFUL makeup vanity! So stylish! I want to point out first about the mirror light because I saw many reviews where people mentioned that their makeup table light was bright when they got it and now it‚Äôs not or that their light just wasn‚Äôt bright at all. So in case they didn‚Äôt know, to adjust the brightness level of each light color, you have to press and HOLD down the light button and only then can you choose what level of brightness you want the type of light that you are using (I added a video of this with my review to show how easy it is to do). Besides that, It was easy to put together. Directions were laid out so that they were easy to read. Took me by myself about an hour and half  to and hour and 45 minutes to put together and I‚Äôm rather good at putting furniture together. Makeup table is stable. Not wobbly at all. It‚Äôs not super heavy either. You are able to move it around after putting it together rather easily if you need to rearrange a room. Perfect for an adult or child. My daughter loved it as her 7th birthday gift. I‚Äôm guilty of using it time to time. For an adult I would suggest getting a different chair. This one works, but that‚Äôs just me, I would get a different chair. So far this has held up against her products. Easy to clean. We did invest in a makeup table mat to go on top to protect it only because children of course are more messy than us and I want this to last her. We also added clear organizing containers for the big drawer. They filled it perfectly. Makes it easier for finding things and more pretty I think when organized. Overall, this was an amazing buy and I literally spent a week or so comparing many many makeup tables on the specific criteria‚Äôs I was wanting. Number one being big but not too big, enough drawers, shelves, touch light, black in color, square mirror not round, came with chair, and price friendly for me (this may vary per person) So this definitely checked all my boxes. Amazing purchase! DEFINITELY recommend!

review_text: I This piece is a little tedious to put together, with all the small parts, but once put together, it's very pretty. However, the biggest feature of this for me was the lighted mirror. After all the work to put it together, the mirror doesn't light up on half of it!!I have reached out 5 times, the mirror on this item is only working on half of it. I emailed the seller in the email that was provided with the package,  and was asked for the order info, I sent all the info, and then no response.I started over trying to get them to respond, again, asked for the order number and got no response. I reached on through Amazon, and no response. This seller is either horrible at service or doesn't care. This is unacceptable for an expensive table that you have to put together.I would suggest not buying, as if it doesn't work, something is missing or you need anything, you will NOT get any service.

product_name: Pure Country Weavers Personalized Woven Photo Blanket - Not Printed - Custom Gift Picture Tapestry Throw 100% Cotton - Made in The USA (72x54)
review_header: Gorgeous, soft and thick photo afghan
review_text: Many years ago I purchased a photo afghan for my in-laws. It was a photograph of them with all of their children. My mother-in-law always had it on display on her sofa. When the second of the in-laws died, that Afghan was the one thing that all of the siblings wanted. They decided that each kid would get it for a year at a time and we would exchange it Thanksgiving.My husband is the oldest so we got the first year. We had a talk a few weeks ago and decided that we would purchase one for each of his sisters and brother. I ordered one as a sample from one of those photo printing places first. It was not nearly as nice as the one I had ordered for my mother-in-law. It was thin and stiff and the photo looked like it was printed on.I saw this company on Amazon and we decided we would try here. As before, I ordered just one. When it came, we were so excited because it was perfect! I immediately ordered four more and we have them to hand out at Thanksgiving. I am sure all of my in-laws are going to be thrilled with these afghans.I normally don't tell whole stories in a product review but, in this case, it was relevant. I wanted to get afghans for my in-laws that were just as nice as the original. This afghan is comfortable enough to use as a blanket and sturdy enough that it will hold up for many years. The photograph is beautiful. The price is very fair. I saw them for much more money at other places on the internet and try to place where it cost less and was not happy with the results.If you are looking for a memento photo blanket, this is absolutely the one I would recommend.

review_text: *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One***When it comes to grooming tools, finding a versatile, efficient, and reliable device that does it all can feel like searching for a needle in a haystack. But then there‚Äôs the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One*‚Äîa true game-changer in the world of personal grooming. This sleek and powerful grooming kit is more than just an all-in-one tool; it‚Äôs the Swiss Army knife of male grooming devices, designed to handle everything from trimming your beard to shaving, detailing, and even personal care. If you're serious about looking sharp, this is the ultimate grooming companion you didn‚Äôt know you needed.**Unmatched Versatility: A Grooming Kit That Does It All**The *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One* is a grooming revolution that combines precision, power, and convenience in one package. Whether you're a fan of a clean-shaven look, a neatly trimmed beard, or maintaining a stylish stubble, this tool has got you covered. The wide range of attachments included ensures you can style every inch of your face and body with ease, providing complete control over your grooming routine.What sets this device apart is its sheer versatility. It features multiple trimming guards, shaving heads, and detailed attachments, allowing you to tackle a wide variety of tasks in one compact unit. The kit includes everything you need for:1. **Beard and Mustache Trimming**: With the adjustable guards, you can effortlessly trim your beard or mustache to your desired length. The precise stainless steel blades provide a sharp, clean cut every time, ensuring a smooth, even trim without any nicks or irritation.2. **Head Shaving**: The *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer* includes a razor head that makes shaving your head a breeze. Its ergonomic design allows for a comfortable grip, even when you‚Äôre maneuvering around tricky spots like the back of your neck.3. **Nose and Ear Hair Trimming**: One of the often-overlooked aspects of grooming is nose and ear hair. With the included attachment, this device offers precise, pain-free trimming that will have you looking polished and professional from every angle.4. **Body Grooming**: Beyond facial hair, this all-in-one tool is perfect for body grooming. Whether you're shaping your chest, arms, or even sensitive areas like your groin, the tool provides gentle and effective trimming without any tugging or irritation.5. **Detailing and Edge Trimming**: The fine detailing attachment allows you to edge and shape your beard, sideburns, or goatee with surgical precision, ensuring that every line is sharp and clean. Whether you‚Äôre going for a classic look or something more modern, the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer* lets you create defined edges without the hassle.**Precision and Power: Built for Performance**What truly elevates the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One* is its high-performance motor, designed to provide powerful and consistent results, no matter the task. The motor runs smoothly across all attachments, ensuring that every cut is uniform and precise. The sharp stainless steel blades are self-sharpening, so they stay in top condition for longer, reducing the need for regular replacements.The groomer‚Äôs ergonomic design ensures maximum comfort and ease of use. It fits comfortably in your hand, providing excellent control as you navigate the contours of your face and body. Whether you‚Äôre trimming your beard or shaving your head, the device gives you the power and precision you need to achieve professional-quality results every time.**Long Battery Life and Quick Charging**Another standout feature of the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer* is its impressive battery life. With up to 60 minutes of runtime on a single charge, you can easily complete your grooming routine without worrying about running out of power midway through. The device charges quickly, so even if you‚Äôre in a rush, a quick charge will give you enough juice to finish the job.The convenience of cordless operation allows you to groom freely, without being tethered to an outlet. Whether you‚Äôre in your bathroom, on the go, or traveling, the cordless design ensures you have the flexibility to groom whenever and wherever you need.**Waterproof Design: Groom Anywhere, Anytime**One of the most impressive features of the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One* is its waterproof design. Whether you prefer to shave and trim in the shower or clean your device under running water, this groomer is completely washable and waterproof. The ability to use the device in wet or dry conditions adds a layer of convenience, allowing you to groom your way, without worrying about water damage.Cleaning the device is just as simple. After use, simply rinse the attachments under warm water to maintain cleanliness and hygiene. The waterproof design makes maintenance a breeze, ensuring that your grooming tool stays in top shape for years to come.**Durable, Long-Lasting Construction**The *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer* is built to last, with durable, high-quality materials that withstand daily use. From the sturdy body to the razor-sharp blades, every component is designed with longevity in mind. You‚Äôll appreciate the feel of a solid, well-built device in your hand, and its long-lasting construction means you won‚Äôt need to worry about wear and tear anytime soon.**The Ideal Grooming Companion for Any Man**The *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One* isn‚Äôt just another grooming tool‚Äîit‚Äôs the only tool you‚Äôll ever need. Whether you're maintaining your facial hair, shaving your head, or tackling body grooming tasks, this device offers complete flexibility and performance to meet every need. With its range of attachments, precision, power, and user-friendly design, this multi-groomer is the ideal companion for any man who values efficiency and style.**Final Verdict: A Grooming Essential for Every Man**In conclusion, the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer All-in-One* is a must-have for anyone looking to streamline their grooming routine. It offers the perfect balance of versatility, power, and ease of use, making it suitable for all your grooming needs. From trimming and shaving to detailed edging and body grooming, this tool handles it all with ease and precision.With its durable design, impressive battery life, and waterproof functionality, the *Philips Norelco Multi Groomer* is built to last, ensuring you‚Äôll enjoy a top-notch grooming experience every time. Say goodbye to cluttered countertops filled with multiple grooming tools and embrace the convenience and power of this all-in-one solution.This is the grooming device you‚Äôve been waiting for. review_header: Decent Performance, But with Notable Flaws
review_text: I‚Äôve been using this inverter for a few weeks now, and while it does its job most of the time, there are a few issues that make it less than ideal. The main problem I‚Äôve encountered is that it occasionally indicates a battery failure even though the battery is perfectly fine. This can be frustrating, as it makes troubleshooting more difficult than it should be.Additionally, the much-advertised ECO feature doesn‚Äôt seem to work at all. It‚Äôs disappointing because I specifically chose this model for its promised energy-saving capabilities.On the positive side, it‚Äôs easy to set up and handles moderate loads without any hiccups.

product_name: Renogy 1000W Pure Sine Wave Inverter with ECO Mode, 12V DC to AC 120V 110V Converter for Off-Grid Solar System, Home, RV, Solar Power Inverter with Remote Switch, Surge 2000W
review_header: 6 months of lite use and it caught FIRE
review_text: See the title. I bought this based on reviews and Renogy brand name. Mistakes on my part.Add to Renogy requiring a SKU to file a claim. I'm not finding that on my Amazon order. This only runs 2-6 a day. TV, small lamp, Amazon Dot.Thankfully it was installed where we could see and smell the smoke.I have a 2nd one new in the box that I'll not be installing. What if this had happened with installed in my camper basement next to my battery bank? No 2nd chances when it comes to safety.

product_name: Renogy 1000W Pure Sine Wave Inverter with ECO Mode, 12V DC to AC 120V 110V Converter for Off-Grid Solar System, Home, RV, Solar Power Inverter with Remote Switch, Surge 2000W
review_text: The Eco mode (the main reason I bought this) only works with something that pulls a lot of power. If you want to run a low wattage light bulb, you have to physically go behind the inverter and change the settings.  I have a Victron and it runs whatever I need, big pull or small. I wanted to like this Renogy but the Eco mode is useless. The inverter drains the batteries on regular mode.

product_name: Renogy 1000W Pure Sine Wave Inverter with ECO Mode, 12V DC to AC 120V 110V Converter for Off-Grid Solar System, Home, RV, Solar Power Inverter with Remote Switch, Surge 2000W
review_text: I am impressed with the noise level using this inverter. It is in my rv and is very quiet.  I have used it with a crockpot, immersion blender and my laptop just fine.  If you are going to max it out it does get more noisy but is still not bad.  For weekend use boondocking this is right for me. For more full time use I would go with a larger watt model.

product_name: Clearly GLOW Teeth Whitening Activated Charcoal Powder + Ultra Soft Bamboo Toothbrush | Pure, Natural, Food Grade, Non GMO, Made in USA | Whiten Teeth Naturally (20g)
review_header: Worth the extra work I need to do for the results
review_text: I read a lot of the reviews saying that it's messy, so with that in mind, I use a little spoon to scoop out a pinch to put in a lipped sauce dish. I wet my toothbrush, shake off the excess water (it turns the charcoal to water rather than a paste if there's too much water on your brush), then I start brushing.This product whitened my teeth about a quarter to half a shade whiter on the very first night I tried it! I'm now at a week into using it and the results are definitely starting to show at a much slower pace. I started to feel like it stopped working for me, but as with all products, since it's only been a week, I will definitely give it more time. Assuming it will be about a month before you actually notice results. Definitely use a different toothbrush. I used a new brush and after 2 days, it's already black where the bristles are attached to the plastic, originally clear plastic with white bristles.There is definitely no taste to the product, but for some reason, that threw me off and made me gag the first 2 nights I used it. I'm getting better with it now, so the lack of taste is actually fine. There *is* a chalky/powdery feeling in your mouth, however, which doesn't go away until you completely rinse (and brush with regular toothpaste afterward) and that texture feels gross to me. Still worth the results!Also, after using this product, I now have to rinse my sink every night, wash it every week, rinse my arm every night, and probably will have to get an apron haha. DON'T wear a white shirt. The charcoal spittle spots are NOTICEABLE! And in my experience, it doesn't really come out unless you rub it in soap really hard or wash it right away.MUCH smaller container than I expected, but it will go a long way.

product_name: Isabella‚Äôs Clearly GLOW Coconut, Teeth Whitening Activated Charcoal Powder | Pure, Natural, Food Grade, Non GMO, Made in USA | Whiten Teeth Naturally
review_text: I used this stuff for the first time and was shocked made an enormous black mess and it seemed to coat everything in a fine black powder and was difficult to wipe off.  It was quite a shock to look up and see my lips and teeth all black.  I look like I‚Äôm getting ready for Halloween!  Now after thoroughly rinsing it did leave a very nice mouth feel and a very fresh taste in my mouth and it did get rid of the metallic taste that I had been experiencing.  I do continue to use it occasionally and very sparingly a little goes a long way!!  And don‚Äôt forget no swallowing and lots and lots of rinsing!! Whatever u do don‚Äôt have on any special clothing item because I would be worried it may not come out of fabrics.  I could be wrong there but the way it smears on the sink and countertops...I wouldn‚Äôt chance it.  Be extra careful when opening it for the first time it emits a black dust cloud when I first opened it and it went everywhere!!

review_text: My sister reccomended that I try using squat wedges to help with my squats.  I decided to try the Flexelent wedges and have been using them for the past 2 weeks, and I already see and feel improvements!The angle helps you get your hips in the right position, making it easier to squat deeper without compromising on form. One of the things I love most about these wedges is how portable they are, I can throw them in my gym bag and take them wherever I go ‚Äì whether it's the gym, to my friends home gym or even just moving them around my own home workout area.  They're super lightweight but sturdy enough to handle all the different squatting exercise I like to do.  Because it is two separate wedges, I can adjust the width of my stance and I can also turn them outward for sumo squats.If you're serious about improving your squats, try these wedges and you will be happy you added them into to your workouts.

review_header: Extremely Cheap/Pieces Don't Fit - Do Not Waste Your Time/Money
review_text: I completely agree with other reviews: "The instructions are simple enough. The material is so cheap, though, you'll destroy it if you use an electric screwdriver, which means you have to manually screw in 109 screws. The holes are not pre-drilled for the brackets that make the seat sturdier...My next step is to reach out to Amazon, but, honestly, if I have to take this thing back apart in order to get money back, I'm going to lose my mind. The product is grossly misrepresented in the description. Disappointed doesn't even begin to describe how I'm feeling after spending a couple of hours on this."I did reach out to customer service and they tried to help by sending me another drawer (not another seat after after agreeing to send both) after two months. I don't have any more time to devote to this. I learned my lesson to buy something local and not deal with furniture from amazon with no customer support again. I would like my money back. Please do not buy. Not worth your time, frustration and money.

product_name: AIEGLE Large Kitchen Hutch Storage Cabinet, Pantry Cabinets with Hutch, Metal Frame Cupboard with Mesh Door, Drawer & Microwave Shelf, Freestanding Kitchen Storage, Brown (59" W x 15.7" D x 68.5" H)
review_header: DIDNT LIKE THE COLOR - SO I CHANGED IT :)
review_text: great set up! I am using this as a dresser, actually. rather that what its intended for. I needed a place to hang my shorts up, so I opted not to install the middle shelf. That way I was able to install a clothing rod and hang up my shorts as desired. I also wasn't too keen on the color, didn't match anything in my house, and considering they only seem to make the large size in one color... I changed it. Originally just sanded down the pieces that would be visible, primed and painted them all black. I did this before I put it together, so that way I had more control over the mess. Halfway through, I got the bright idea to add a bit of my flare to it, and as you can see... went a little crazy. Im really happy with how it turned out, however. Also, for the top outside left and right cubbie type things, I opted not to install the black mesh cabinet door, that way I could give a home to these 2 infinity mirrors I took from another piece of furniture. Turned out the dimensions of the shelves for the top-right and top-left parts of this thing, just so perfectly matched the dimensions of these infinity mirrors... well... almost. Installed an LED strip behind the metal support bar underneath the top section, as to light up the counter space, and another LED strip behind the metal backing thing, with the oblong hole pattern. to give it some back-lighting, or whatever you might call that. As for the actual product, though. NO complaints. Easy to install. Sturdy materials, looks great (even better now!), and functionality is perfect, and super versatile. Think outside the box! It says "kitchen pantry cabinet" but could be used for a number of things. Options are endless once you use your imagination :)

product_name: AIEGLE Large Kitchen Hutch Storage Cabinet, Pantry Cabinets with Hutch, Metal Frame Cupboard with Mesh Door, Drawer & Microwave Shelf, Freestanding Kitchen Storage, Brown (59" W x 15.7" D x 68.5" H)
review_header: Great hutch but check pieces all carefully
review_text: UPDATE: The legs on my unit weren‚Äôt mislabeled after all, they were just made incorrectly so some of the holes were ‚Äúbackwards‚Äù and there was also an entire hole missing on one. I was able to mess with it and still get the backing on, but there‚Äôs nothing I can do about the hole that‚Äôs not there. I mean, I could drill a new one, but it‚Äôs sturdy enough without it so I‚Äôm not going to risk it. Overall, this is a really sturdy, good-looking hutch. Just make sure you carefully look over all your pieces when you get them before starting it, so you can figure out if you can work around it or if you‚Äôll need to contact the seller/return it.ORIGINAL: First of all, these thing is heavy and will be very sturdy when/if you get it fully set up. Second, you need to read through the instructions and lay out all the parts before attempting to put it together. After doing that, you also need to go through the instructions step by step and make sure that every part (EVERY single part) is correctly labeled - especially the ones that are mirrored/used on opposite sides of the hutch. I almost had the base constructed when I realized that pieces 1 and 2 (the legs/lower side bars) had been swapped, so I had to undo several steps to fix it. They have to be installed correctly or the whole base will be backwards. Also be careful because the instructions have you assembling it front side down - which means the drawer slides are constantly sliding down, making installation (and disassembly) tricky. In the process of undoing everything to swap the legs where they should be, one of the drawer slides slid and snapped out which is fixable, but frustrating. I‚Äôve inspected every other piece and from here on out they all seem to be labeled correctly ‚Äî it was just 1 and 2 that were switched. All that said, it is a really nice hutch - but god help you if anything is mislabeled.

product_name: Clearly GLOW Teeth Whitening Activated Charcoal Powder + Ultra Soft Bamboo Toothbrush | Pure, Natural, Food Grade, Non GMO, Made in USA | Whiten Teeth Naturally (20g)
review_text: I knew it would be messy, and there's even a warning label that says to be careful but WOW nothing could have prepared me for this stuff. It gets EVERYWHERE. It's like laser toner it just shoots and floats around. It sticks to everything: marble, ceramic, my hands, tongue, gums, even the toothbrush itself is hard to clean. I had to use a scouring pad to clean my bathroom sink after I was done. After showering, multiple tooth brushings and waterpikking I still have some of it stuck to my gums and tongue.I was inspired by the other reviewers who had significant whitening after just one use. I am happy for them but my teeth did not get any whiter so there is no way I am going to bother with the hassle of using this again.

product_name: Clearly GLOW Teeth Whitening Activated Charcoal Powder + Ultra Soft Bamboo Toothbrush | Pure, Natural, Food Grade, Non GMO, Made in USA | Whiten Teeth Naturally (20g)

product_name: Squat Wedge Block Pair, Squat Ramp, Calf Raise Block, Anti-Slip Slant Board for Squats, ATG Equipment to Boost Workout, 17¬∞ Incline, 3.5x5.9x12.2, Backpack Included
review_header: Yes, you need these for your squats
review_text: I‚Äôve been looking for squat wedges to help me reach a good depth and to help me stay in a more upright position while in the squat.The Flexent wedges are the ones that called out to me with the pop in color and overall design. Once they came in, I was very impressed with how sturdy they felt, considering how lightweight they are.It‚Äôs good to know that elevating the heels during squats can help to alleviate tightness in the calves and ankles, which I believe allowed me to achieve a deeper squat with better form. These wedges also help target the quads and glutes more effectively, which is great as I am focusing on building those quad muscles. #gainsThe lightweight, portable design of the Flexent wedges makes them easy to incorporate into your routine at the gym, at home, or wherever you do your fitness (they even come with a bag).Overall, these wedges are a smart investment for anyone looking to enhance their exercise experience, to ensure that you are hitting the depth that you want, to build up your quad muscles, and to achieve even better results. No lie, you need these in your routine!

review_text:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    We love how much our new pantry hutch has organized & cleaned up the look of our kitchen. It's holding snacks & food, desk items, crafts & all the stuff that I just don't know what to do with (without throwing it out)! My counter tops & bar are cleared off. My everyday items that I need handy are in a drawer that amazes me at just how deep it is & how much it holds. I don't have to dig thru cabinets & baskets to find what I need anymore! Happy with this item is an under statement!The assembly was beyond my ability so my daughter & son-in-law spent an afternoon (6 hours @ a casual pace) getting it all together. Also, this is a very heavy item @ 200lbs. It arrived in two boxes of 100lbs each & the FedEx driver wasn't too accommodating when asked to bring up 6 steps to our porch, so he left the boxes at the bottom of the stairs.It's a very sturdy piece, no cardboard, even for drawer bottoms. It has adjustable feet if there's a need for evening up the levelness. The dimensions are as stated in description. The rustic color with black mesh & peg board backing are complimentary for our decor. I've purchased other shelves in same color & they all blend perfectly. This unit did not come with an electrical outlet or lighting. I've added a small surge protector & decorative lamp. I'm also going to add a small motion light to the drawer that holds my 'desk' items.We love it!

product_name: AIEGLE Large Kitchen Hutch Storage Cabinet, Pantry Cabinets with Hutch, Metal Frame Cupboard with Mesh Door, Drawer & Microwave Shelf, Freestanding Kitchen Storage, Brown (59" W x 15.7" D x 68.5" H)
review_text: Pros: - The "veneer" is plastic, not wood. This is good thing because it's thick and durable. For me, this isn't simply going to sit and look pretty - it's going to get some use. I appreciate it. - It's sturdy - it does not feel flimsy and don't have any concerns about putting things on it (including up top). - pretty decent build quality for materials. You can tell they went the extra mile on some things. Though for the price, I guess that's kind of expected. For example, the slide rails for the draws.. very nice! The draws themselves don't feel flimsy or such. The back boards are thick and veneered on both sides.- I do like the design and size of it (I got the darker model)- It's each to remove and not use the screen doors. That's nice, if you decide to change the look slightly. Cons: - This is an intermediate-advanced level assembly. Take your time. It will take hours. It's easy to accidently use two sets of screws, as they have the same threads and look similar, and this can give you headaches later on (pro tip: the 4 medium length black screws with allen heads - they are for the joining the top and bottom sections - don't use the longer ones for this) - for the price range, it could have paid $30-50 more and probably got something that had a little bit better look (but functionally, this is fine). Overall - very pleased with the hutch, impressed with the quality of it, and feel confident in the product.

review_text: I purchased three of these cabinets for my toy collection and I totally love them! The well packaged order arrived quickly. The assembly process was fairly easy with the detailed instruction booklet. The cabinet dimensions are by far better than other cabinets. This cabinet has five shelves instead of four and the spacing between the shelves is 15 inches which is much better than other cabinets. The LED lighting strips are easy to install with three color options. The cabinet is manufactured wood but very heavy and sturdy. The glass doors are framed in metal and I love the slow door close feature. The cabinet does not come with the needed USB cube for the lights to work as well as the cam hole covers which I had to purchase separately. I too was very troubled with the cloudy glass that would not clean with Windex or alcohol, but after I combine my own glass cleaner with Distilled white vinegar, Dawn dish soap and warm water, the cloudy film and marks on the glass came right off and the glass is perfectly clear and beautiful. There was no instruction in the booklet on how to clean this cabinet so you just have to figure it out. It requires elbow grease work to get this cabinet clean but in the long run, it‚Äôs by far the better display cabinet for my needs and I am very impressed and love it very much. Thank you.
